alert.note: Alert for Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 25 at 10:32AM EST until February 26 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville affecting Owsley County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville. * WHEN...From this morning to early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.7 feet this afternoon. - Action stage is 21.5 feet. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued at 8 PM on Friday, February 25th.
